title: Mirror on the World: Poetic Reflections
description: My words are my wings.They send me soaring.My words are my wings,and, I hope, never boring.My poems speak of love and loss,of humour, and good cheer.Nature in abundance.The seasons of the year.My words are my wings.My words come from my heart.My words are my wings.They are mine to impart.
author: Ann Perry
